Calla_Lily.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.
Calla_Lily.obtained:
- Found near laktes
- Found in Springvale
- Sold by Flora
Calla_Lily.name: Calla Lily

Cecilia.description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.
Cecilia.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Starsnatch Cliff
- Sold by Flora
- Given by an NPC at the top of Starsnatch Cliff
- Given by the nun in front of Mondstadt's cathedral
Cecilia.name: Cecilia

Cor_Lapis.description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."
Cor_Lapis.obtained:
- Found under cliffs in Liyue
- Found in Mt. Hulao
Cor_Lapis.name: Cor Lapis

Dandelion_Seed.description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.
Dandelion_Seed.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found at Mondstadt's front gates
Dandelion_Seed.name: Dandelion Seed

Glaze_Lily.description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.
Glaze_Lily.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Sold by Ms. Bai
- Found in Qingce Village
- Found in Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor
Glaze_Lily.name: Glaze Lily

Jueyun_Chili.description:
A spicy plant native to Liyue.
Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.
Jueyun_Chili.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Qingce Village
- Sold at Wanmin Restaurant
Jueyun_Chili.name: Jueyun Chili

Noctilucous_Jade.description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.
Noctilucous_Jade.obtained:
- Found in caves in Liyue
- Found in Mingyun Village
- Sold by Shitou
Noctilucous_Jade.name: Noctilucous Jade

Philanemo_Mushroom.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
Philanemo_Mushroom.obtained:
- Found under the eaves of houses
- Sold by Chloris
Philanemo_Mushroom.name: Philanemo Mushroom

Qingxin.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
Qingxin.obtained:
- Found in the heights of stone forests
- Sold by Bubu Pharmacy
- Found in Guyun Stone Forest
- Found in Jueyun Karst
Qingxin.name: Qingxin

Sea_Ganoderma.description: A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.
Sea_Ganoderma.obtained: - Found in the wild of the Golden Apple Archipelago (Event)
Sea_Ganoderma.name: Sea Ganoderma

Silk_Flower.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
Silk_Flower.obtained:
- Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor
- Sold by Ms. Bai
- Found near Wangshu Inn
Silk_Flower.name: Silk Flower

Small_Lamp_Grass.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
Small_Lamp_Grass.obtained:
- Found in the wild at night
- Found in Wolvendom
- Found in the Whispering Woods
- Sold by Flora
Small_Lamp_Grass.name: Small Lamp Grass

Starconch.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
Starconch.obtained:
- Found on the beaches of Liyue
- Found on the frigid coastlines of Dragonspine closer to Liyue
Starconch.name: Starconch

Valberry.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, The watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.
Valberry.obtained:
- Found in the wild around Stormbearer Mountains
- Sold by Chloris
Valberry.name: Valberry

Violetgrass.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.
Violetgrass.obtained:
- Found near cliffs in Liyue
- Sold by Verr Goldet
- Sold at Bubu Pharmacy
Violetgrass.name: Violetgrass

Windwheel_Aster.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are the "visible winds."
Windwheel_Aster.obtained:
- Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
- Found under trees in the wild
- Found in Stormterror's Lair
- Sold by Flora
Windwheel_Aster.name: Windwheel Aster

Wolfhook.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.
Wolfhook.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Wolvendom
- Sold by Chloris
Wolfhook.name: Wolfhook
